data.actual_result: the Shortcut/Hotkey menu remains open when you close overlay, blocking the screen.
data.expected_result: The Shortcut/Hotkey menu should close when overlay is closed.
data.short_description: The Shortcut/Hotkey Menu (ctrl + ? or command + ?) stays open when you close overlay, until you close it while overlay is open.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord Overlay. - Open the Shortcut/Hotkey Menu (ctrl + ? or command + ?). - Close Overlay.
